CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( Owner:User.Profile_Name__c = "ASM", Owner:User.Profile_Name__c = "Deputy ASM", Owner:User.Profile_Name__c = "Sr. ASM" ), Owner:User.FirstName & " " & Owner:User.LastName,
IF( OR( Owner:User.Manager.Profile_Name__c = "ASM", Owner:User.Manager.Profile_Name__c = "Deputy ASM", Owner:User.Manager.Profile_Name__c = "Sr. ASM" ), Owner:User.Manager.FirstName & " " & Owner:User.Manager.LastName,
IF( OR( Owner:User.Manager.Manager.Profile_Name__c = "ASM", Owner:User.Manager.Manager.Profile_Name__c = "Deputy ASM", Owner:User.Manager.Manager.Profile_Name__c = "Sr. ASM" ), Owner:User.Manager.Manager.FirstName & " " & Owner:User.Manager.Manager.LastName,
IF( OR( Owner:User.Manager.Manager.Manager.Profile_Name__c = "ASM", Owner:User.Manager.Manager.Manager.Profile_Name__c = "Deputy ASM", Owner:User.Manager.Manager.Manager.Profile_Name__c = "Sr. ASM" ), Owner:User.Manager.Manager.Manager.FirstName & " " & Owner:User.Manager.Manager.Manager.LastName, '' ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: ASM Name
